ModMetaData.name: TimeSlider
ModMetaData.author: AliceCecils
ModMetaData.description:
Slider for time rate, ultra speed key (4) always unlocked as well as step by tick... if you wanted to
POWERED BY HARMONY
How this works Two Patches, all c#: TickManager_TickRateMultiplier = Slider times a fitted function to make the slider not zoom out of the way TimeControls_DoTimeControlsGUI = redo the renderer as a slider and pause button as well as redo the key bindings with non locked up. keeps tutorial tags and is new or existing game friendly.
this mod is in the public domain and will always be available at github.com/alycecil
Thanks - Alice
